review: Keeps dropping connections or taking a looooong time to load an app. Connectivity and stability are worse than Apple TV. Nice selection and navigation, voice search is especially nice.

review: We are loving it! Easy to find things by speaking into the control and actually easy to find Prime movies to watch without have to pay for anything else.Plus, based on what we are watching Amazon sends me emails with other movies that are similar to the ones we are watching.If you love the old movies you'll love Amazon Fire and the control could not be easier.  We have order the Amazon Fire Flash drive for the other TV so we don't have to move this one from one tv to the other when our grandson is here.
